recap_documents.description: ORDER that Petitioner's Amended Petition for Writ of Habeas Corpus 74 is DENIED. The Clerk of Court shall enter judgment accordingly. FURTHER ORDERED that the stay of execution entered by this Court on October 16, 2001 (Dkt. 5), is VACATED. FURTHER ORDERED that a Certificate of Appealability is GRANTED as to the following issues: Whether the Court erred in determining that Claim 9, alleging ineffective assistance of counsel at sentencing, lacked merit.
